query.default: select JobTitle, Department, DocumentName, SignedResult from Sungero_Reports_EmployeeSignedDocumentReportV2 where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId

query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] [varchar](256) NULL, [JobTitle] [varchar](max) NULL, [Employee1] [varchar](max) NULL, [Department] [varchar](max) NULL, [BusinessUnit1] [varchar](max) NULL, [DocumentName] [varchar](max) NULL, [DocumentLink1] [varchar](max) NULL, [SignedResult] [bit] NULL)
query.postgres: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NULL, [JobTitle] citext NOT NULL, [Department] citext NOT NULL, [DocumentName] citext NOT NULL, [SignedResult] boolean NOT NULL)

query.default: insert into Sungero_Reports_EmployeeSignedDocumentReportV2(ReportSessionId, JobTitle, Employee, Department, BusinessUnit, DocumentName, DocumentLink, SignedResult) values (@ReportSessionId, @JobTitle, @Employee, @department, @businessUnit, @DocumentName, @documentLink, @SignedResult)

query.mssql: SELECT SignatureType ,Sungero_Core_Recipient.Name ,Sungero_Company_JobTitle.Name ,SigningDate ,doc.Name ,dep.Name ,businessUnit.Name FROM Sungero_Core_Sign LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient ON Sungero_Core_Sign.Signatory = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc doc ON Sungero_Core_Sign.EntityId = doc.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Company_JobTitle ON Sungero_Company_JobTitle.Id = Sungero_Core_Recipient.JobTitle_Company_Sungero LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient dep ON dep.Id = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Department_Company_Sungero LEFT JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc docNOR ON docNOR.BusinessUnit_Docflow_Sungero = Sungero_Core_Recipient.Parent LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient businessUnit ON businessUnit.Id = dep.Parent;
